subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Starting a session [1 Attachment]
author: Tim Woolworth
full_text:
Jerome,

I like how your crew sounds is more personal than mine when they let you
know they are ready to start.  Your sample, "Hello, people are here" is a
nice example.  My "Now" guy sounds very brusque but I have become used to
him.  Interestingly, I have never had anyone from the other side tell me
when a session is over.  I always have to end the session or they would
continue talking to me forever.  About 70% of the time when I try to end a
session I get a very clear "wait" because they have something else to say.

Tim
